help-file.title: "DROW ELF"
help-file.content:
Living far beneath the surface, deep within the bowels of the Underdark, drow elves are a swift-moving, crafty, remorselessly wicked people ruled by a society of priestesses who serve the demonic Spider Queen, Lloth. The drow are an extremely intelligent race, and their abilities and ambition are feared and loathed by races throughout the Realms, particularly grey elves, their distant cousins and blood enemies.
Because of the length of time they spend below the surface, drow are hurt by the natural light of the sun and the light of fire. To compensate, they have permanent ultravision, allowing them to see in total darkness. However, they seldom travel to the surface, and never during the daytime. Drow tend to be weaker and frailer than humans, but are better in most other areas. Drow are somewhat resistant to magical attacks.
Class list: Warrior, Cleric, Sorcerer, Conjurer, Necromancer, Thief, Assassin, Bard, Reaver. Innate abilities: levitate, faerie fire, ultravision, fireball, globe of darkness, mass dispel.
Warning: As one of the eight evil races on Duris, the drow are extremely difficult to play and face many hardships. Their hometown has been specifically designed to make life hell and death waits around every corner. Drow will most certainly encounter situations that would be deemed "unfair" to any of the surface races. We did this to create a new challenge for those advanced players who have "beaten" the challenge of life on the surface world and are looking for something more difficult. You should NOT play a drow unless you are a *very* advanced player and are used to the Duris style of MUDding, or are willing to face the hardships without complaint, as it will NOT be easy.
